name: Spiegel Online unobstrusive redesign
description: Styles the german news website spiegel.de . Tries to keep the overall flair of the page while offering a beautiful redesign.

user.name: dominikschreiber
user.about:
I'm a Frontend-Developer. Well designed stuff is my passion. My tools are html (especially the html5-part), css (mostly done with less) and javascript (meaning: angularjs, knockout, jquery, sometimes coffeescript).

Currently I'm finishing my masters degree in computer science. My topics are software security, natural language processing and ubiquitious computing.

Aside that I'm a musician, playing piano, bass and trombone. And I'm a passionate Christ Follower.

changelog
-----------

### 0.0.3

- removed `background-size:cover` from section headers to drastically improve scrolling performance

### 0.0.2

- added support for the "einestages" section (was full-width before, is now 860px max-width)
